speaking.title: Làm bài luyện nói | Luyện đề VSTEP

parts.instructions:
Topic: Traditional festivals carry important cultural values.

Honor community strength
Teach history and culture
Traditional festivals
Your own ideas
Improve spiritual life

Follow-up questions:
1. Which local festival in your area or country would be most interesting for a foreign guest?
2. Do people today appreciate public holidays as much as in the past?
3. What should the government do to preserve traditional festivals?
